org.eclipse.eef

Interface EEFGridLayoutDescription

  • All Superinterfaces:
    EEFLayoutDescription, org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject, org.eclipse.emf.common.notify.Notifier
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EEFGridLayoutDescriptionImpl

    public interface EEFGridLayoutDescription
extends EEFLayoutDescription
    A representation of the model object 'EEF Grid Layout Description'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Number Of Columns
    • Make Columns With Equal Width
    See Also:
    EefPackage.getEEFGridLayoutDescription()

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfColumns

        int getNumberOfColumns()
        Returns the value of the 'Number Of Columns' attribute. The default value is "1". The number of columns used inside the grid layout.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Number Of Columns' attribute.
        See Also:
        setNumberOfColumns(int), EefPackage.getEEFGridLayoutDescription_NumberOfColumns()

      • setNumberOfColumns

        void setNumberOfColumns(int value)
        Sets the value of the 'Number Of Columns' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Number Of Columns' attribute.
        See Also:
        getNumberOfColumns()

      • isMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth

        boolean isMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth()
        Returns the value of the 'Make Columns With Equal Width' attribute. The default value is "1". Indicates if the columns should have an equal width.
        Returns:
        the value of the 'Make Columns With Equal Width' attribute.
        See Also:
        setMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth(boolean), EefPackage.getEEFGridLayoutDescription_MakeColumnsWithEqualWidth()

      • setMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth

        void setMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth(boolean value)
        Sets the value of the 'Make Columns With Equal Width' attribute.
        Parameters:
        value - the new value of the 'Make Columns With Equal Width' attribute.
        See Also:
        isMakeColumnsWithEqualWidth()
